messages.subject: Ski Trip Final Payment

messages.subject: High School Musical Production
messages.body:
Mr. Abell,

Make sure you don't miss the opportunity to see the stunning production of High School Musical next week. Tickets have sold out for Wednesdays performance but there are still a few avalible for the Wednesday and Thursday performances from reception

we hope you enjoy the Show

Mr. Abbey
